name: Ronshade
description:
"Ronshade" is a roguelike game that unfolds in a turn-based system. Players will embark on an adventure, obtaining powerful items and delving as deep as possible.

With a turn-based system where the result of the player's actions is displayed, you can enjoy the game with intuitive and speedy controls. Over 100 unique and distinctive items appear, and the outcome of battles can greatly change depending on the items obtained and the player's choices.

In this game, you can equip cards to the items you obtain. By attaching specific combinations of cards to items, special effects are triggered or new skills are unlocked, demanding efficient item collection from players.

Fight against various enemies, try different strategies, and make efficient choices to achieve the best results. The continuous sequence of failure and success will draw you into the world of "Ronshade."
